N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 634.2 - Conditions for reimbursement for State supplementation of SSI or AABD
State Regulations
(a) No portion of
any claim for reimbursement for AABD or additional State payments may be
supported wholly with State funds if reimbursement may be claimed from a
program for which there is Federal participation. (b) Any claims for reimbursement for an
activity or program which were not fully reimbursed as claimed and which were
properly made at the time they were originally claimed may be claimed pursuant
to this Part, provided that the revised claim is reimbursable pursuant to this

Part, the claim is timely, and an adjustment made to reduce the original claim
is simultaneously submitted to the department. (c) Claims for reimbursement pursuant to this

Part shall not be submitted if such claims seek reimbursement at rates or
amounts that are greater than otherwise authorized by the department. (d) Any claims for reimbursement for AABD or
additional State payment expenditures which are subsequently determined by the
department to be reimbursable from another program or activity for which

Federal participation could be received, or for which a higher proportion of

Federal participation could be received, shall be reduced in an amount
equivalent to the amount determined by the department to be due as a result of
the availability of Federal participation. (e) Any adjustments of claims for
reimbursement, including adjustments to claims as a result of recoveries or
collections, shall be made in accordance with procedures, instructions or
directions of the department. Notes
